entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. High 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Snow level 1000 metres. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High 7. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 1. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 70 percent chance of rain showers this evening then 70 percent chance of flurries overnight. Snow level 1000 metres lowering to valley bottom near midnight. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High 6. POP 30%
